website_summaries.verdict: This compact, pen-shaped engraver is ideal for those who want to do more intricate or artistic etching and carving.
pros: Small enough to hold like a pen
Power controlled by a fingertip switch
Diamond engraving bit included as standard
cons: Does not work on all common materials
Some complaints about anemic motor performance

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable batteries should be used.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to engrave one tea cup. I enjoyed using it so much I found another project; engraving 30 cups! The only down side is that it runs down batteries but I have solved that by purchasing rechargeable batteries which seems to give the motor more power. It is comfortable and easy to use. No coaching necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Aysha Goodridge

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this engraver!
customer_reviews.text: The engraver mounting shaft “the place were the bit installs on to the engraver” fell out of the engraver. It won’t spin and when I point the engraver down the entire piece falls out. It’s non operational. This is a cheaply made machine and is unusable. Do not purchase this item. Please note: this is something you cannot tighten it is supposed to be permanently attached to the engraver. It’s to bad, I was looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Granholm

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy tool gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Love this little tool and it's what I expected! Even my kids are able to use it (pic is my 8 yr old making a flower... after trying it for 5 minutes)! Takes a few tries to get used to how the tip spins but we found it's better to barely let the tip hit the surface... if you press too hard it makes squiggly lines from how the tip spins. Nice alternative to my wood burning tool especially since my kids can use this. Don't expect it to look like you paid for engraving at Things Remembered, but for little jobs it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: teachk mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: I like it... even though I have to replace tips and batteries often
customer_reviews.text: Its certainly not powerful for epic engravements, but it was great to get 28 ti-84's engraved to prevent stealing :D I had to change the battery once, and it already needs a new drill tip... Otherwise it is a handy little thing. I didn't mind holding down the power button. If you absolutely have to, a small piece of duct tape will do it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jakathera

customer_reviews.title: Kept turning off
customer_reviews.text: When it actually works it does a great job. I used it on ceramic and metal and it engraved beautifully. My problem with it is that it overheats quickly and turns off. You have to wait a min and then turn it back on again and so on until ur done. The last time it turned off it, it wouldn't turn back on at all. It was cheap and i engraved what I wanted to engrave, just wish it would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: NMS523

customer_reviews.title: It Was Good...While It Worked...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to engrave medicine syringes. I have a medically complex child who uses a lot of medications, and the markers wear off on the syringes quickly. The first 15 syringes it worked perfectly. Then it just stopped working. I tried new batteries and tightened the tip...nothing. Then, a few minutes later, it started working again. So, I did about 5 more syringes, and it stopped again. I checked the batteries and the tip again...but nothing. I’ve waited, and still nothing. I’m not engraving deeply in a hard surface. It didn’t even slow down...it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Tnkrbel

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Just ordered another!
customer_reviews.text: This pen does exactly what I needed it to, and its way better than what I was expecting! The vibration the pen uses to engrave takes a little adjustment to get used to, so it's important to keep a light touch and start slow. So happy I found this -- thanks for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for the price, but we've since purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for the price, but we've since purchased a Dremel that can provide more pressure and accuracy. We needed this to engrave something on the back of metal merchandise that was damaged, so this worked, but didn't provide the hard engraving we wanted, more so a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: JLovesBooks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little tool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to grab the size is just like a pen, nice metallic blue covering, diamond bits are able to engrave glass, metals, wood, a lovely tiny screw driver is included, its made of magnet ,used to replace bits, an extra bit is included, an adorable tiny transparent box is included to hold the screw dryer and the extra bit, even the batteries are loaded and its ready to be used. This tool amazed me and the seller provided in that little package all what is needed to make the customer happy.
customer_reviews.author: Donya

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: For the value you can’t beat it. It took a little practice but I got the hang of it quickly. Worked great on polymer clay, all the wording on the birdhouse I did was done by using this pen!
customer_reviews.author: Stephan P.

customer_reviews.title: For tiny holes on sea shells... Engraving on glass and metal...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mother. For a long time she was collecting seashells to make a windchime and other projects of hers. I bought battery powered engraving pens before but we couldn’t manage to drill a tiny hole on a sea shell. The tips were too big. But this one is great. It has 2 different size tip. 1 small and 1 is bigger. I tried engraving on glass and metal it worked on both surfaces. For small projects it is great. It is easily hold pen size tool. For first time engraving tool users: Do not use force. Let it rotate and do the work. Because using force will make it stop rotating.
customer_reviews.author: Derya

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive engraver does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: I had a few items I wanted to mark for my household inventory in case of theft and ordered this engraver. I tried it out on some test items first to get better at handling it. The marks are deep and straight enough to read easily which is the point if I ever have to turn in a theft report to the police - I stand a better chance of retrieving my items with personal engraving on them. Nice little engraver for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good fun little engraver
customer_reviews.text: Nice little crafting engraver. Works well on wood and metal, like my keys. But this particular one had issue was not powerful enough.
customer_reviews.author: Shark BaitTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Works for Small Stuff
customer_reviews.text: For the money it is decent. I have used it primarily on plastic dongles and a few plastic cases. It does what I need to do though a little more power would be great...but for the size and the value it’s good enough. If your looking for something to do some simple Etching, this will work. I use this to put my initials on my plastic stuff at work so people don’t get my stuff confused with their stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Arlington, VA

customer_reviews.title: HIT EM WITH A DAB
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a day so I'll let people know if it does die on me cause I know thats kinda a problem according to the other reviews. I like it. Its light and it really etches precisely. I work at a benihana as a chef and so I decided to engrave my spatula with a dabbing squidward. Little did I know not alot of people watch SpongeBob anymore. It turned out really cool tho. I engraved it on stainless steel. I'll update my review if the engraver stops working. For the price it's really good.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: I know it's a cheap engraver. but this one works and came with extra bit which means ill provably get 4-5 years out of it instead of the 2 years I got out of the last.(I have a dremel but no bits this tiny) if $12 is your price, you won't be disappointed. super easy for tools, eyeglasses, jewellery, other discreet engravings
customer_reviews.author: laBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This is great while it lasted. Did little things around the house with it. However; when the time came to use it for what I actually bought it for (buying new bicycles for the family and wanted to put our initials small on them) it was just dead no matter what battery you put in it or what you do to it just dead.
customer_reviews.author: Allister C. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Works AWESOME...but for a week
customer_reviews.text: It’s a shame......this product is so easy to hold, use-but it breaks after a very short time. The but won’t hold or tighten in place. So basically is useless once that happens. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my uses.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little engraver. It's not powerful, but does what i need it to. One complaint I have is that it doesn't use a standard size for the bits. I have a set of diamond bits that work in my Dremel, but they won't fit this device, thus I have to buy my bits through the this device's manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Works great on all types of materials
customer_reviews.text: This little guy comes in very handy. I purchased it before a deployment to number locks to keys and mark some of my gear to make sure it doesn't get lost. The biggest problem I have had is keeping up with this as all my buddies keep taking it to label their stuff. I have used it on wood plastic and metal no issues so far. Awesome deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Much better quality than the Harbor Freight equivalant.
customer_reviews.text: I had the Harbor Freight one that looks identical; needed another and ordered this. This one is MUCH better quality. I'm delighted with it. Light, powerful, simple. I just ordered 2 more for work. Yes, it costs a little more. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LabStuff

customer_reviews.title: It worked right away but really hard to use and keep straight so everything came out crooked and not pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. It worked right away but really hard to use and keep straight so everything came out crooked and not pretty.
customer_reviews.author: JE135

customer_reviews.title: Used once then it never worked again.
customer_reviews.text: Totally bummed about this product. I used a friend's AA engraver and it was powerful enough to do what I needed (engrave names on plastic glasses frames), but this one is WEAK even with fresh batteries. Used it once, put it in the drawer and the next week when i needed it again --D E D ---dead---. Changed batteries, nothing. so sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, but the quality of mark isn't the best. Low power for the level of mark making I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Grnclover786

customer_reviews.title: The tip didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly like you would think. I had no real problems with it. But I only used it on plastic, even so, the tip wore out after engraving the date and my initial in plastic maybe 10 times. That's not too good. They did include an extra tip, which is good, I just didn't expect to need it already, when I have used the engraver so gently and infrequently.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Herren

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: So it doesnt work all that well and honestly felt like a waste of money. It only worked for the first couple dog tags i made and then the tip seemed broken and the writing looked terrible. Im not new to engraving so it's not on my end lol
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: Works great for casual use
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on rocks, my macbook, my bicycle frame, and lots of other random things, and it has held up very well so far. It's probably not nearly as high-powered as a corded engraver, but it works great if you just need it for casual use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Luchsinger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little engraver
customer_reviews.text: I have a dremel, but I wanted something small and pencil like to engrave my keys. Small enough i just keep in my bag and works very well. Happy with my purchase i have bought 2 of them so far. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Power button won’t stay engaged while etching.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the tool and while pushing the red power button while writing it keeps stopping making it difficult to restart where you left off. Very disappointing. I was able to lightly engrave five letters while having to keep tapping the power. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Simple, which is all I need.
customer_reviews.text: The cheap batteries it came with were no good, but I didn't mind (takes 2 AAA). I used it to engrave some tools of mine and equipment for work. Just hold the red button and presto. Nice and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Jordon

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright .... E for effort >.<
customer_reviews.text: Mehhhh should be only $10 ... does the job but 1) i was hoping it wasnt That loud , thing sounds like a Nitro RC Car .....2) makes a very thin engraving that may take 5 passes just to etch what it is your trying to put
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Cheap engraver, only kinda works. I am simply trying to engraver my name on some plastic equipment for work and it hardly does the job. The shaft even fell out after 2 minutes of use and I had to out super glue on it to get it working again. Doubt it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: J. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star off
customer_reviews.text: I figured as much. It does not come with Duracell batteries as shown in the product's description. I cannot understand why some companies just cannot give honest descriptions and/or images.
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: Practice first but good item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent engraver for sterling but i recommend you practice first before actually writing on it. It shakes a lot. I love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for engraving my metal dog grooming blades, but the button is kind of touchy. Sometimes you have to jiggle it just right while pressing the button. It feels almost like the batteries move around inside too much and the connection is off.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Mark your gear!
customer_reviews.text: Does a really good job on marking your gear at work so when you loose your cuffs, it will come back to you 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Zman

customer_reviews.title: youd need really steady and strong hands to make a nice "cut"
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't even really "engrave". all it really does is scratch and it's not even stable. youd need really steady and strong hands to make a nice "cut"
customer_reviews.author: EJ Win

customer_reviews.title: Tip falls out while engraving
customer_reviews.text: The tip just fell right out while I was engraving on glass on the first day I got it. you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Noor Javid

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and durable stickers
customer_reviews.text: Since I put some of these stickers on my car, it has rained heavily, and they have all stayed on perfectly (very durable, high quality adhesives!) I did have some difficulty putting on the American flag decal as it's more complicated to apply than a normal sticker, so I ended up wasting one of them by accident. I reached out the seller, and they promptly replied with an instructional video and an extra pack of American flag stickers (great customer service!).
customer_reviews.author: Jino

customer_reviews.title: I immediately trashed the included battery for a good, name brand
customer_reviews.text: I immediately trashed the included battery for a good, name brand, but this "engraver" is still very under powered for anything but the softest metals.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Missing set screw
customer_reviews.text: Is there supposed to be a set screw to hold the bit in place? It appears there is a little threaded slot and no screw. Bit falls right out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool for Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find something that would let me explore engraving, and this worked pretty well! It takes a lot of effort to keep the lines straight with all the bouncing around, and I wish that there were smaller heads included so I could try different thicknesses in my lines, but its pretty great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hansen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this engraver! When it arrived, I planned to work on some washer bracelets. The engraver worked through about a dozen letters then stopped working completely. I had maybe 5 minutes of usage. To the sellers credit - total no hassle return, wish is great but what I really wanted was an engraver that works. You get what you pay for. I’m ordering a Dremel.
customer_reviews.author: LJM

customer_reviews.title: This is a sweet little tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet little tool. Didn't carve as deep as I needed for my hand stamped jewelry. I needed something to carve a line which I could black in and this wasn't deep enough, but I'm sure I'll find a use for it somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for small tasks
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to engrave mini flashlights for all the men in my Christmas shopping list without paying a fortune. It worked great, but a little more challenging to write with a vibrating pen on a rounded surface. Would be great if the surface I was engraving was flat, but no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Hreat product very smooth easy to handle i used it to engrave my dogs tags love it my kids use it to a few things .
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda puga

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it , i just think having a pointy needle would be better. Recommend buying it. I had nevwr used one in my life and its simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy two!
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine, but get two and engrave them. Mine disappeared almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Möbius Jackson III

customer_reviews.title: Write it up
customer_reviews.text: For the price..excellent...good feel and just have your batteries charged..for full effect.
customer_reviews.author: javier rosete

customer_reviews.title: Nice fine engraver
customer_reviews.text: This engraver has a very fine end similar to an actual pen. The end looks like a little ball but it leaves a very fine line. I used this to write names and years on Christmas ornaments and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Good for price but not the best engraver
customer_reviews.text: For its price it does the job! But it takes a lot of practice and skill to actually engrave something clean and nice. I will probably end up buying a more expensive much nicer engraving pen in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love it first time I’ve used one and did pretty good on stone
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for carving a name into this stone I had..not sure what type of stone though. It was a little hard doing the rounded parts of letters but that’s probably just me not knowing how to use it and it being my first time.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Love

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a treat. If you have good penmanship and use light pressure, this is the tool for you. (So far I've used it on both metal and glass.)
customer_reviews.author: F. Beu

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: A little under powered but did the job. I put my CDL on some pistol magazine's. Just take your time and it will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I think that it works really well and the end product of using it is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gallion

customer_reviews.title: I love this tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool. It's very easy to use with a "steady" hand and has worked great at labeling both plastic and metal items (particularly for summer camp).
customer_reviews.author: New Horizons

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for engraving eggs for and eggery display. Small enough to hold and not too heavy to hold and remain steady.
customer_reviews.author: Curtiss

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far works good. Bought it to identify my tools that keep coming up missing at work. Engraved several today and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: JCrochet

customer_reviews.title: Works great! The last ones had a rather short life
customer_reviews.text: Used for engraving aluminum tags with numbers out in the field. Works great! The last ones had a rather short life. These appear to be a bit tougher.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The tip wears out quickly ... even though it comes replacement tip... which also wears out quickly
customer_reviews.author: Mario Posada

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best handheld engraver ever used. I really like this due to it being battery operated and portable. I was able to engrave my tools really quick. Does take a while to get use to but overall great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Beginner
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time trying engraving, and this was a great starter tool. I used it to engrave both wood and thick glass and it worked great both times. Reminder to beginners to make sure to outline your design with something first :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Tried it out and worked great! Fun too
customer_reviews.text: I received this item from the vendor in just a few days after order. Tried it out and worked great! Fun too! Engraved a bunch of items and all turned out great! I would order form this vendor again. FBM from Texas
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Morris

customer_reviews.title: Dont waist your money
customer_reviews.text: Dont waist your money on this engraver. On plastic it does leave a mark on what you are engraving but on metal dont even try. The motor bogs down really fast if trying to leave a good mark.
customer_reviews.author: shawn nielson

customer_reviews.title: Very neat and easy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little tough to curve on some things, just practice before your official engravings but it’s a very neat tool to have
customer_reviews.author: NoWayImMichael

customer_reviews.title: Decent engraver
customer_reviews.text: While the description reads that it will engrave any surface, it is an exaggeration. I purchased primarily to engrave aluminum tags I use for jewelry making and I found I have to go over the pattern a couple of times to really mark the surface, risking damage as I pass multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Ross

customer_reviews.title: Company doesn’t have replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: Directions say to not take screw completely out because it is very easy to lose. No joke here. That booger disappeared! Contacted the company and they don’t have replacement parts...had to buy a whole new one
customer_reviews.author: Erin Norman

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as expected, I used product on ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as expected, I used product on dog tags and it was just to much of a vibration to create clear crisp lines.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size perfect job
customer_reviews.text: this little grinder was perfect for what I needed it for I had to engrave my mother's name on several urn necklaces and it work perfect for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very handy.
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing for engraving names on items you send with your kid to camp or college.
customer_reviews.author: valerie hunter

customer_reviews.title: Engraved gifts
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and was a very good price .
customer_reviews.author: gloria perry

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Works about as expected. Great for initialing tools and things, but pretty basic and limited tool.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Ok for some small jobs....definitely wouldn’t recommend for tools.
customer_reviews.text: I guess if you are engraving glass or something soft, would work ok. I needed to engrave a lot of tools, just was not up to par. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lessnick

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: It works great, you have to apply apprsure only use it like you would use a pin and you will be truly happy. Best engraver I have brought so far I have another one but it requires for me to use more pressure but this works amazing
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Medina

customer_reviews.title: Works well and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: This engraving pen is fun to use! I used it on many things like wood, plastic, glass and metal...and it worked fine. Now I just have to think about some DIY projects to do using this awesome tool!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Delicate
customer_reviews.text: Gave out a out a week prior to the return date deadline. I thought the batteries were worn out, so I set it aside.
customer_reviews.author: Mexican SheWolf

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Had for a couple months. Hardly used, now wont work. Save your money invest in a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works better than advertised. Excellent service from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Big

customer_reviews.title: It drains the batteries little bit fast if you work on metal but it is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: It works! It drains the batteries little bit fast if you work on metal but it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised and great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Vladic

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works but very low power or torque but for the money it will do what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Brittjr

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: start slow as it is a bit strong when you first start to engrave.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good to engrave tools on the spot!
customer_reviews.text: Good price/value. Downside is no rechargeable battery pack, lacks a bit of power, but for the size great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery.......works well I'm the using the diamond tip..The other tip isn't as sharp
customer_reviews.author: calthrope

customer_reviews.title: Good little engraver for the price
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these to engrave jewellery she makes, they work well for her...I bought like 4 of them
customer_reviews.author: Libero Kinnear

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for most anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. Easy to use and great for marking keys, etc.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little engraver for the value, has a little trouble with stuttering when it's overheated but other than that it's amazing fit the price, works on glass, metal and clay just perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Alasdair Ashland

customer_reviews.title: It's ok i guess.
customer_reviews.text: The button is faulty. Sometimes it works sometimes it doesn't. The speed will jump from super slow to super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Chris The Great

customer_reviews.title: Love this engraver. Handy
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It works great with Duracell batteries, not any others tho.
customer_reviews.author: TexTank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, small engraver. Works perfect. I used it to engrave three Android tablets. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Gauntletwielder

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on metal
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on metal, didn't really work on small pebbles that I was trying to make into chess pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Black

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I use to engrave all my tools at work, I love the fact that its cordless, stays in my tool box until I need it and then it's just a click of a button and my name is on the tool. And it works and engraved just like a corded one, definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin olsen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Engraving!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Engraving !!! I'm so glad I order this. it work so good and easy to use I recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jlos Stgo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Mice little product, does what it says it will do. Have to remind myself to use a light touch. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Strathbogie

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and very handy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it... great price for a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: Not buying a third
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought two already. The first one worked as described but then I dropped it and shortly after that it stopped working. So I bought another and it didn’t work at all!
customer_reviews.author: OVVVVVO

customer_reviews.title: Nice engraver for the amateur
customer_reviews.text: Small works well. I didn't have any experience using these ,but made a nice personalized gift. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Next best thing when you don't want to pay to have it done
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use. I had some jewelry I wanted to engrave on. I suggest you practice a little first. When I priced what it would've cost to have it engraved. Its not professional but its good
customer_reviews.author: Diane N.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, I keep it in my back pack for work.
customer_reviews.author: PC Rider

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: This product does just what it says, and it's really easy to use for a beginner like me. Gor it being pretty Inexpensive it did the job way better than anticipated! So good product 👍
